typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(DerivedCol1 = Col1,
		DerivedCol2 = Col2) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:(concat(toString(random(1)),'.parquet')),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		DerivedCol1,
		DerivedCol2
	)) ~> sink1
